did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, minutes, annual reports, faculty profiles, and administrative files of the chairman documenting the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Microbiology, which no longer exists as a separate academic unit.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Microbiology, Yale University, Records (RU 722). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, minutes, annual reports, faculty profiles, and administrative files of the chairman documenting the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Microbiology, which no longer exists as a separate academic unit.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by alphabetically by subject.
